definition: Stuttgart city in southwest Germany and capital of Baden-Württemberg 巴登·符騰堡州|巴登·符腾堡州[Ba1 deng1 · Fu2 teng2 bao3 zhou1]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: The Audi factory in Stuttgart, Germany.
sentences.chinese: 奥迪在德国斯图加特的工厂。

sentences.english: Hodgson has allowed the Swiss defender Philipp Degen to join Stuttgart on a season-long loan.
sentences.chinese: 老霍同意将瑞士人德根租借到斯图加特一年。

sentences.english: Liverpool are allegedly keeping tabs on Stuttgart striker Pavel Pogrebnyak.
sentences.chinese: 利物浦最近看上了斯图加特前锋波格列布尼亚克。

sentences.english: I went to a trade show this week in Stuttgart.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我到斯图加特参加了一个贸易会展。

sentences.english: Both met while studying at State Academy of Art and Design in Stuttgart.
sentences.chinese: 他俩在斯图加特的国立艺术与设计学院学习时相识。

sentences.english: Leimer will not continue to fly long - haul away the sworn enemy of Stuttgart.
sentences.chinese: 而不莱梅则要继续长途飞行客场挑战死敌斯图加特。

sentences.english: Munich, Kiel and Stuttgart were the fastest.
sentences.chinese: 慕尼黑，基尔和斯图加特是进度最快的。

definition: Leipzig, city in the state of Saxony, Germany
